description: {"blocks":[{"key":"66ofo","text":"General protocol for preparation of lyophilized primer stocks from IDT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dqndb","text":"Recommended: When you receive your lyophilized primers, check the name of the primer, primer sequence and the concentration listed on the tube. IDT provides a specification sheet you can download/archive for more information.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"fc04c","text":"Lyophilized IDT primers, molecular grade water, pipettes and pipette tips.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1t9kf","text":"Reconstitute lyophilized primers in required volume of molecular grade water (i.e., RNase/DNase free) to  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ft2o8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgn4u","text":"Allow stock solution to thaw completely at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36ioq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9t5o9","text":"For a typical   PCR reaction,   of each primer is used (i.e.,   final concentration).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"244D272162C111EEAB010A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"244D279C62C111EEAB010A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","concentration":"0.4","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"244D281F62C111EEAB010A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ai183","text":"After water has been added, vortex for at least   to ensure the lyophilized primers are fully dissolved. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"01963939622D11EEBD770A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emohr","text":"Practically, the microliters of water required to create a 100 µM solution is 10x the nmol concentration of lyophilized primer (i.e., if   is noted on side of tube, then add   of water to stock tube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":137,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":174,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ip74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"23.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2825}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"235","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dolh7","text":"Once reconstituted, the stock solution can be stored in a labeled box at  , and thawed completely before use. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"27e4v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"o5dc","text":"Vortex the stock solution for at least   to ensure homogenization before adding it to the working solution. {"blocks":[{"key":"9dbrn","text":"Once the concentrated stock is added, vortex the new working solution for at least   and store at   to use as needed.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":98,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cjm7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"01963939622D11EEBD770A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a08l5","text":"To maintain optimal use of your primers, limit freeze/thaw cycles, as this can lead to degradation over time. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c40c","text":"While waiting for your stock to thaw, prepare clean microcentrifuge tubes by labeling them with the primer name and date of preparation. Label the lid so it is easy to identify tubes in freezer box.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emro","text":"To prepare a   working solution from the  , you will dilute 1:10  (i.e.,   of stock for every   of water).
